name: FOS - Download File(s)
description:
Fetche and initialize the browser download of database-stored files.

Free Plug-in under MIT License

All FOS plug-ins are released under MIT License, which essentially means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if commercial or private use.

Overview

Use the FOS - Download File(s) dynamic-action plug-in to start the browser download of files stored in the database. The files can be compiled via a SQL query or procedurally in a PL/SQL code block. If multiple files are returned, they will be zipped automatically. A single file can optionally be zipped as well. The files can be BLOBs or CLOBs.

The plug-in supports "Wait for Result" so you can continue following actions once the file has been downloaded, or listen to the download completed event to perform further actions.
